does not need a readme
and yet, here we are... so why?
Hmm, what if we make a ***List of all the Reqrirments!***

# BASE INFO
some information that doesn't really change, so shall stay
## Cost of Items
### Burgers
1. Plain burger: $4.99
1. Cheeseburger: $5.99
1. Veggie burger: $6.49
1. Bacon Burger: $7.99
